channel.title: Welcome on Video Translator
channel.description: Recent content in Welcome on Video Translator

item.title: What Team VideoTranslator Did In 2021
item.description: The plan was to get this news item out prior to the end of the 2021. Unfortunately that did not work out. So… Happy New Year. Ok - we will do another post saying Happy New Year and listing out what we are looking forward to in 2022. But for the moment, we want to talk about 2021. Thankfully, that’s a wrap on 2021! 2021 was a bit of a hard year for Team VideoTranslator.

item.title: Merry Christmas!
item.description: Merry Christmas! And we very much hope you have had a good year, and are looking forward to winding down for year-end. Here at VideoTranslator, we have had a mixed year, probably like most people in 2021. We Wish You And Yours A Merry Christmas As I was writing this, the urge was to turn this into some kind of victory lap and talk about our wins and losses in 2021.

item.title: Memperkenalkan Anggota Baru: Selamat Datang Tessa, James dan Yuriy!
item.description: Kami senang banget untuk berbagi berita ini dengan kalian! Perkenalkan anggota baru di tim Video Translator: Tessa, James dan Yuriy. Kami sangat senang mereka sudah bergabung! Rekan Kerja Baru Dalam beberapa bulan ini, tim dari Video Translator sudah berkembang pesat! Sekarang, ada 5 orang yang bekerja di aplikasi penerjemah favorit kalian! Tessa Berasal dari Indonesia, Tessa Joana bergabung bersama kami sebagai Junior Digital Marketing. Video-video yang dia hasilkan keren-keren banget dan dia juga merupakan seorang pekerja keras, terutama di akun Dandelions.

item.title: Our Team Is Growing: Welcome Tessa, James & Yuriy!
item.description: We are super excited to share this news with you! Team VideoTranslator is growing. Welcome to Tessa, James and Yuriy. We are very excited to have you come aboard. New Team Members! Over the course of the last few months, Team VideoTranslator has grown! Now we are a team of five working on your favourite video translation app! Tessa Originally from Indonesia, Tessa Joana joins us in a Junior Digital Marketing role.

item.title: Year In Review 2020
item.description: Happy New Year 2020 is over. Thankfully. This might be tempting the fates just a bit, but really, 2021 has got to be better right! Team VideoTranslator: Happy New Year Jokes aside, the big learning from 2020 was to be more grateful. The strength shown by people worldwide was extraordinary, and we could not be more grateful for the kindness of strangers, friends, and family in what was a difficult time.

item.title: Merry Christmas 2020! Thank You From Video Translator
item.description: What a year it’s been! From getting locked down, to the great conjugation! Obligatory Dancing Santa! Merry Christmas 2020! Thank you for all the support! Thank You Thank you everyone for all your support! We want to wish you and yours a Merry Christmas! Everyone who engaged with us, others that offered feedback, and folks who made a purchasing decision - thank you very much.

item.title: What Arabic Voices are Available?
item.description: Previously we’ve gone through the list of our English speaking AI and the different dialects they speak. You can see them all here. In this article we’re looking at our Arabic speaking AI and the different dialects and voices available. If you need a reminder as to how to select the appropriate AI language and dialect, check out our article here. Now, on to the voices! We’ve used the phrase birds of a feather, flock together or الطيور على أشكالها تقع for our AI to say each time for the examples.

item.title: Extra! Extra! Read all about it!
item.description: There’s a lot of exciting developments at VideoTranslator, which means exciting things for you! This means that you’ll be hearing more from us going forward in the form of a weekly email. If you haven’t subscribed to our mailing list or signed up for a free trial yet, please do so here. The email will be featuring the latest articles we’ve posted which will be like the following: What English Dialects are Available?

item.title: Happy New Year 2020!
item.description: Its the start of a new decade! This is a big deal, the only question is will this be the roaring 20’s all over again. Here at VideoTranslator we think it is going to be an exciting year. Several amazing things happened last year, and this was mostly due to the kindness of strangers. Thank you very much to all the folks who took an interest in our work. We started to get some traction, we found a niche where our tech was useful, and slowly slowly things started to come together.

item.title: What English Dialects are Available?
item.description: Did you know that our AI can speak in over 180 languages and more than 120 differing dialects and different genders? It’s true! That’s one smart robot ;) In this article we’re focusing on English and the four different dialects that you can choose from when using our app. For those that have you used the app before, you will notice that we have renamed the “voices”. Previously we had them named as EN-IN-P-M1, or UK-S4-M which didn’t make a lot of sense for those who were unfamiliar with the technology.

item.title: How We Used SEO To Come Up With A New Name
item.description: Our original name was QBL Media, and our new name is videotranslator.ai. The original name did not really work, and was always a temporary name. This post covers some of the context of where our platform came from, and what changes happened in the course of getting this app to market, including a pivot. We used SEO to determine a new name. Read on to understand why this was done, how it was done, and what benefits we expect to get from the name change.

item.title: We Just Launched And We Need Luck
item.description: For the last 2 years or so, we have been working on a new platform which we think will be super useful for content creators. This includes marketers for exporters, tourism concerns, media shops and everyday folks looking to build brands and businesses using tools like YouTube and LinkedIn. Just for some background, we are a tiny software company, and think of ourselves as basically an independent studio, trying to craft the best tools we can.

item.title: What Languages Are Available?
item.description: We look at the number of languages which you can use with your content. Remember, each languages is potentially a new market, and care needs to be taken to properly target your preferred leads. There are two kinds of transcription, the first is Speech-To-Text Transcription, the second is a Text-To-Speech Transcription. In both cases, speech is involved, hence these are referred to as transcription AI’s. Similarly, with translation, what we are actually using is a Text-To-Text Translation AI.

item.title: Happy New Year!
item.description: We had a very good 2018 here at Video Translator. While a challenging year, the majority of the platform was built in 2018. Oddly, doing hard things well is enormously empowering, if a little scary. Important events in 2018 included: Moved into Fishburners, our brilliant co-working space, in the new Sydney Start Up Hub. Brought on two fantastic developers, Vivek Kumar and Pranay Shah. Both these guys have been absolutely critical in getting our platform over the line.

item.title: Visual Guides: How To Sign-Up
item.description: The below describes how to sign-up to the Video Translator application. Following sign-up, how to login to the platform is also covered. Steps To sign-up for the application, please follow the below steps: Please direct your browser to videotranslator.ai, and then click on the Sign Up button. Please input your email address, and select languages. Your primary language is assumed to be English, and you will be able to select an additional 2 languages (additional languages are available within the application).
